Package com.fluidops.ajax.components

collection of components / widgets such as trees, table,s inputboxes, etc.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FAbstractTextInputWithAutosuggestion.AutocompletionOption<T>
    Generic interface for autocompletion options.
    FChartRenderer.ChartRenderer  
    FForm.Validator
    the interface for all validators, also for the custom
    FTable.ClassRenderer<T>  
    FTabPane2Lazy.ComponentHolder
    This FTabPane2Lazy.ComponentHolder allows indirect access to the FComponents that actually represent the tab-content.
    FTextInput3.ClassRenderer<T>  
    FTree.FTreeFilter
    interface for tree filters.
    FTreeTableInfo<T>
    interface for setting up a treetable page
    ReloadableModel
    table / tree MVC models are subject to asynchronous changes.

    implements the component container concept.

    simple selector for a time (hour/minute/seconds)

    A specific kind of FImageButton.

    This class implements the Desktop Window manager.
    FDesktopLayout
    This is a minimalistic default layout that renders all windows in one column.
    FDesktopLayout.FLayoutHints
    This is the base class for layout hints.
    FDesktopWindow
    This class represents a Desktop Window.
    FDialog
    The component is based on the JQuery dialog (http://api.jqueryui.com/dialog/)

    http://jboss.org/drools jboss drools highlighter does html formatting of drools language based on keyword, string and comment indicators

    Flexible container with dropdown component.

    FDropdownMenu2 Deprecated
    - no need for serverside
    FDropDownMenuT  
    FEditButton
    A specific kind of FImageButton.
    FEditTable
    editable table 1) table 2) extra edit button in the first column to edit rows 3) cancel / save / delete buttons at the bottom of the table 4) form for editing / entering new row
    FEditTable.EditTableModel
    table model that allows the table contents to be edited via the FEditTable
    FErrorMessage
    Box to display error message
    FExtendedList  
    FExtender
    extender (used for breadcrumbs)
    FForm
    Represents a html form element
    FForm.AsciiPrintableValidator
    checks if a field is not empty and does only contain ascii printable characters
    FForm.BooleanValidator  
    FForm.CellValidator
    Check if input string is a cellphone number
    FForm.DateVal
    checks for a valid date
    FForm.EmailPatternValidator
    Only allows emails which match a specific pattern
    FForm.EmailValidator
    email validator checks for valid eMail addresses also supports IDN-domains
    FForm.EmptyOrNestedValidator
    Validates successfully if component is empty or if if the FForm.EmptyOrNestedValidator.nested succeeds.
    FForm.FloatValidator
    float validator checks for floats
    FForm.FormHandler
    Interface of a form handler implementation defines what happens on form events
    FForm.LongValidator
    long validator checks for longs
    FForm.NoCommaValidator
    Checks that the returnValue is not null, not empty and does not contain commas
    FForm.NoOperationFormHandler
    Form Handler which does nothing
    FForm.NotEmptyAndNestedValidator
    Validates successfully if both FForm.NotEmptyValidator and the FForm.NotEmptyAndNestedValidator.nested succeed.
    FForm.NotEmptyValidator
    checks if a field is not empty
    FForm.NumberValidator
    number validator checks for integers
    FForm.PosNumberNullValidator
    number validator checks or integers must be a positive not 0 number
    FForm.PosNumberValidator
    number validator checks or integers must be a positive not 0 number
    FForm.RegexValidator
    Match input string to given regex
    FForm.URLValidator
    Check if input string is valid URL
    FForm.VoidValidator
    void validator (doesn't check the input)
    FForm2
    Represents a html form element fcomponents style without validation TODO: add help, suggestions
    FGauge
    gauge component (speed-o-meter)
    FGauge.GaugeOptions
    holds all the options which are available and can be transformed to json do not rename variable names, if so change them accordingly isnide ajax.js
    FGrid
    Simple table grid
    FGridLayouter
    Layouter class to position any number of FComponents in a table grid, i.e., two dimensional.
    FGroupedDataView
    Component to visualize grouped table like data, possibly employing lazy calls.
    FHorizontalLayouter
    Layouter class to position any number of FComponents next to each other horizontally.

    Represents a html code element

    sortable HTML component

    FLabel
    Represents a label that can String Note that html characters are encoded Use super class FHTML to render html-code as such
    FLabel2
    basic version of a label supporting any kind of object as value and always displaying toString() for that object in HTML encoded format
    FLabel3  
    FLayouter
    Abstract base class for auto layouting components.
    FLayoutTable
    Basic table Layout container
    FLink  
    FLinkButton
    A component which looks like a link but acts like a button, i.e., you can fetch the onClick java script event by implementing the onClick() method to this class just as in FButton.
    FList
    Flist is a list which can be filled with strings used for hostids formfield in nodestates.jsp

    FMultiContainer
    Implements a "container host", which supports easy switching between several sub containers in the same place.
    FMultiTextfieldInput
    This component creates rows of textfields with expand (symbol: +) and contract (symbol: -) buttons.
    FNumberField
    represents a textfield with 2 button one for increasing the number in the field the other for decreasing

    This class represents a UI page binding/model.
    FPageComponent
    Wraps FPage into an FContainer.
    FPasswordField
    basic password field (uses post requests in order to transmit password)
    FPopupWindow
    Component that shows a (page-) modal message box.
    FRadioButtonGroup
    group of radio buttons
    FSelectableTable<T>
    A table for selectable components: the table takes as input a FSelectableTableModel, which renders a checkbox in the first column of each row.
    FSideBar
    Accordion like component: A menu which only allows one active submenu.
